Mendoza

Accountants & Tax Advisors in Mendoza

Everything you need to know about accountants & tax advisors as an expat in Mendoza. Locations, tips, costs, and local insights.

Overview

English-speaking accountants for expat tax planning and compliance.

Important for navigating Argentine tax system, especially for remote workers and business owners. Many specialize in expat situations.

Recommended Providers

Estudio Contable Expat

Specializes in expat taxes

Consultora Internacional

Cross-border tax planning

Contador Digital

Modern, digital-first approach

Tips for Expats

  • Find accountant familiar with your home country's tax treaties
  • Essential for digital nomads and business owners
  • Get CUIT/Tax ID sorted early
  • Monthly accounting services $50-150 USD
  • Ask about monotributo vs general tax regime

Costs

Initial consultation: $50-100 | Monthly services: $50-200 | Annual tax filing: $200-500

Documents Needed

  • CUIT/CUIL
  • Bank statements
  • Income documentation
  • Previous tax returns (helpful)

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need an accountant?

Highly recommended if working remotely, running a business, or staying long-term. Argentine tax system is complex.

What is monotributo?

Simplified tax regime for small earners. Fixed monthly payment covers taxes and social security. Ask your accountant if you qualify.
